Description 
Maximum Security Trend Micro Titanium revolutionizes Internet security. It is a proven Internet-based technology that automatically stops viruses and spyware threats before they infiltrate your computer. 

Features 
Spam Blocker 
Detects and blocks emails annoying and dangerous, and image spam. The detection of spam in real time provides immediate protection against epidemics. 

Real Time Updates 

It protects against the latest online threats, both today and in the future. Maximum Titanium Smart Protection Network Security ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ combines the real-time antivirus scanning for Trend Micro to offer always-on protection keeping you safe from the latest malware threats and evolving. 

Parental Controls 
Easily protect their children from inappropriate websites, limit time spent online and see detailed reports on their activities online without having to spy on them while surfing. 

Protection Against Data Theft 
Prevent spyware and hackers stealing confidential data like credit card numbers, passwords, email addresses and other private information. 

Keep your data safe is transmitted through Web pages, emails or instant messaging. Use the predefined categories or establish their own new categories. Just put part of a word or number on the list Protection against data theft, you can protect all that word or number. For example, if you enter only the last four digits of your credit card may prevent the acquisition of the whole number through spyware. 

Trend Micro Vault 
A password-protected folder can protect confidential files. If lost or stolen computer, remotely block this safe to keep safe the files it contains. 

Secure Erase 
When you delete a file only removes the directory information used to find, but not the actual data. Secure Erase function overwrites deleted files with random data, so you can not retrieve the content. 

Turner System 
Reclaim disk space, speed up the start of Microsoft Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Windows Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® by cleaning your IM history and optimize the performance of your computer. Schedule automatic adjustments to maintain smooth operation of your computer. 

Shortly Consumer Resources System 
Titanium uses technology from Trend Micro ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ Smart Protection Network ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, which collects and analyzes data from threats and blocks viruses and other malware before they reach your computer. Because the process takes place online, Titanium consumes less memory and disk space on your computer, so it will not slow your performance. 

Detailed security reports 
The easy to understand graphical reports provide full details on the threats that have attacked your computer. You can view detailed records with just one mouse click.
